works.description:
My original content has been republished 

without my authorization, notification or any credit. A quick read of both
 
my original review and the one posted at the Blogger page specified  
indicates obvious infringement.

This review is available through EzineArticles.com, however their usage  
guidelines require complete disclosure of the original author vie a "bio  
box" and a link to the author's website. Because there is no link or bio  
box this article can be considered a direct infringement of my copyright.
